name: Lanthanum
educationalNotes: Lanthanum starts the rare earth element series! Lanthanum oxide used in camera lenses (high refractive index). Lanthanum nickel metal hydride batteries power hybrid cars. Mischmetal (lanthanum-cerium mixture) ignites spark plugs. La-Mg alloys are super-strong and lightweight. Rare earth magnets contain lanthanum. Discovered in 1839. Despite 'rare' name, more abundant than tin/lead. Lanthanum carbide is hard ceramic material.

diffusion.usage: Sum atomic contributions for compound Σv, then: D_AB = 0.00143×T^1.75 / (P × M_AB^0.5 × (Σv_A^(1/3) + Σv_B^(1/3))²)
